channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: There are multiple potholes in this area and when you drive into the avenue, around the middle of the road, ans to the right, and all of the way up until around halfway up.the road., 13th October
item.description:
Shelley road before turning into Shelley Avenue - is generally in poor repair with multiple potholes. I've seen repairs done twice now and it's still in very poor. The whole of the hottom halft of the avenue, certainly on the one side needs attention. Some have been fixed, and others right next to them, left. There is still several large holes on the right near the kerb, around numbers 2 and 4.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 22, Shelley Avenue, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain sunken in road, 13th October
item.description:
The drain cover is so sunken that is poses a risk to road uses, particularly motorcyclists and cyclists. Cars regularly swerve to avoid this. What 3 Words: ///deaf.offer.bleat

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Lansdown Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Water is bubbling out of the ground, 12th October
item.description:
After the road narrows and by the style gate. Water is bubbling out of the tarmac. It did this last year resulting in black ice. It started again after the recent heavy rain and hasn’t yet stopped bubbling up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
